text:
"Kakashi-sensei tolong lah! Hi-ks kalau tidak aku akan menangis lagi" Ucap Sakura terisak.
"Ugh! Baiklah hanya 4 jam tidak lebih! Kalau kau melebihi batas jam kerjamu aku akan menyeret mu keluar dari rumah sakit konoha" Ucap Kakashi memandang Sakura dengan tatapan horor.
"Yosh! Baiklah terimakasih kakashi-sensei aku akan kembali bekerja sekarang aku menyayangimu!" Ucap Sakura dengan sembarangan dan langsung keluar dari ruang hokage.
Kakashi terdiam. Apa tadi Sakura bilang apa? Ia menyanyangi kakashi? Ah wajar bukan kalau mantan murid nya sayang pada gurunya ah Kakashi apa yang kau pikirkan buang jauh jauh pikiran itu. Jantung Kakashi berdetak dengan tidak karuan.
"Ah gadis itu selalu saja membuat jantungku ingin keluar" Gumam Kakashi.
****
Sakura menghempaskan dirinya di kursi ruangan kerjanya. Ia merasa lelah sangat lelah sampai kaki nya sudah tidak sanggup berjalan. Batas jam kerja nya sudah selesai ia menunggu chakra nya pulih agar bisa pulang ke apartemen nya.
trans:
"Kakashi-sensei, please help me! Sobs, If you don't help me I will cry again" Said Sakura Sobbing.
"Ugh! Okay, just 4 hours, no more! If you exceed your office time limit, I will drag you out of The Konoha Hospital" Said Kakashi looking at Sakura horribly.
"Yosh! Okay, thank you Kakashi-sensei, I'm going to work again now, I love you!" Said Sakura carelessly and got out of Hokage's room.
Kakashi clams up for a while. "What did Sakura say? She loved Kakashi? Ah, it's normal, right? If a former student loves her teacher, ah Kakashi what are you thinking about? Throw it away." Kakashi's heart beat uncontrollably.
"Ah, that girl just makes my heart beat faster" Kakashi mumbled.
****
Sakura throws herself onto the chair in her office room. She feels so tired and her feet have no energy to walk. The office time limit is over, she waits to regain her chakra so that she can come back to her apartment.
